name: SAELIG (itch)
description:
(Old English: blessed, fortunate, prosperous, happy)

SAELIG is a strategy game with RPG elements centred around the life of you and your family as you try to survive and bring wealth and prosperity to your household. Set in Dark Ages England, you will enter the Anglo-Saxon kingdom of Wessex during a time of turmoil where you will choose your path and do what you must to make your mark on the world around you, for generations to come. 

You have the freedom to be who you want and to play the way you want - trader, business owner, worker, landlord, thug, watchman, abbot, and more. The choice is yours.

        

SAELIG is a hobby project being developed in my spare time when I'm not at my day job. I love this game and am creating something that I'm proud of and that I enjoy. The Itch.io version of the game is DRM free. SAELIG is currently in Early Access which means it is still under development, is not feature complete, and there can be bugs.

SAELIG is heavily inspired by The Guild 2. So if you're into that you may very well be into this.

Have questions or need help? Join us on Discord or email me.

*SYSTEM REQUIREMENTS*

  • Windows 64Bit (Can also build for Linux and Mac if requested)
  • Modern Multi-Core CPU
  • 8GB+ of RAM
  • Dedicated GPU with 1GB+ of VRAM

If you’re unsure if your computer will be able to play the game please download the demo version first.
